quote: He methodically basted the dark skin of the Alsatian, which he had stuffed with garlic and herbs.""One rule in life"", he murmured to himself. ""If you can smell garlic, everything is all right"".
quote_letters: HE METHODICALLY BASTED THE DARK SKIN OF THE ALSATIAN WHICH HE HAD STUFFED WITH GARLIC AND HERBSONE RULE IN LIFE HE MURMURED TO HIMSELF IF YOU CAN SMELL GARLIC EVERYTHING IS ALL RIGHT
